member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.PropertyGrid.Interop.WinForms.UITypeEditorPriority
member.summary: Represents a control that is capable of leveraging a UITypeEditor.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.PropertyGrid.Interop.WinForms.UITypeEditorPriority.Highest
member.summary: Indicates that UITypeEditor definitions will take priority over all other property editors.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.PropertyGrid.Interop.WinForms.UITypeEditorPriority.BeforePropertyEditorCollections
member.summary: Indicates that UITypeEditor definitions will take priority over the and collections.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.PropertyGrid.Interop.WinForms.UITypeEditorPriority.Lowest
member.summary: Indicates that UITypeEditor definitions will only take priority over the default property editor.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the object.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.PropertyGrid.Interop.WinForms.UITypeEditorControl.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
member.remarks: This method is called by the public Dispose method and the Finalize method. Dispose invokes this method with the parameter set to true. Finalize invokes this method with set to false.
